title: Page Context
description: Describes the current page being viewed, including URL components, content classification, and locale.

url.description: The full URL of the current page.

path.description: The path component of the page URL (e.g. /products/shoes).

title.description: The document title of the page.

referrer.description: The URL of the referring page.

search.description: The query string portion of the URL (e.g. ?q=shoes&color=blue).

category.description: The content category or section the page belongs to.

type.description: The page type classification (e.g. home, product, category, article, checkout, search, landing).

language.description: The BCP 47 locale/language of the page content.

encoding.description: The character encoding of the page (defaults to UTF-8).
